code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Box,Paper,Typography,FormControl,InputLabel,Select,MenuItem,Button,Container}from'@mui/material';import{ASSET_CLASSES,LENDERS}from'../constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SetupForm=_ref=>{let{onComplete}=_ref;const[assetClass,setAssetClass]=useState('');const[lenderName,setLenderName]=useState('');const handleSubmit=()=>{if(assetClass&&lenderName){onComplete(assetClass,lenderName);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',minHeight:'100vh'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:3,sx:{p:4,width:'100%',maxWidth:500},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,align:"center",children:"LSS Workflow Builder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",gutterBottom:true,align:"center",sx:{mb:3},children:"Configure your loan workflow by selecting the asset class and lender"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormControl,{fullWidth:true,sx:{mb:3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{children:"Asset Class"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{value:assetClass,label:"Asset Class",onChange:e=>setAssetClass(e.target.value),children:ASSET_CLASSES.map(asset=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:asset,children:asset},asset))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormControl,{fullWidth:true,sx:{mb:3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputLabel,{children:"Lender Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{value:lenderName,label:"Lender Name",onChange:e=>setLenderName(e.target.value),children:LENDERS.map(lender=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{value:lender,children:lender},lender))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,size:"large",onClick:handleSubmit,disabled:!assetClass||!lenderName,sx:{mt:2},children:"Start Building Workflow"})]})})});};export default SetupForm;
